meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marjorie Kelly Randy Jackson J.C. Turner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #539.

td.p: Marjorie Kelly, a student from Santa Monica, California
Randy Jackson, a branch sales manager originally from Memphis, Tennessee
J.C. Turner, a pharmacy student from Amelia, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,000)

tr.td: WORLD LEADERS
NUTS
RIVER SONGS
WOMEN IN SPORTS
MARCH
IN OTHER WORDS...

(Alex: A few words of explanation, if I may, about this last category. "In Other Words..." came as a result of a big foo-foo that occurred at the Disney Studios last year, when the employees staged a minor revolt when they changed the title of Basil of Baker Street to The Great Mouse Detective and they sent out a memo, tongue-in-cheek, very much so, about what would happen if they changed the titles of all the other great Disney films. So, "In Other Words...", we'll give you an answer and you have to come up with the title of the Disney film as we know it.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: J.C.
Randy
Marjorie
BOOKS & AUTHORS
GEOGRAPHY
ACTORS & ROLES
AUTOMOBILES
MYTHS & LEGENDS
PAYCHECKS
(Alex: And finally, something all of you are hoping to collect at the end of your sojourn on Jeopardy, a paycheck or two.)

tr.td: J.C.
Randy

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Alex reveals J.C.\'s answer]
(Alex: Who are the [*]? Added an "H" at the end, but we don\'t penalize our contestants for spelling.)
MarjorieWho are the Navajo?
$2,000
J.C.Who are the Navajohs?
$400
Navajo')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'America\'s largest reservation houses mainly members of this tribe')

tr.td: AMERICAN INDIANS
America's largest reservation houses mainly members of this tribe
J.C.
Randy
Marjorie
2-day champion: $15,800
3rd place: a Smith-Corona typewriter
2nd place: a trip to the U.S. Virgin Islands
J.C.
Randy
Marjorie

8 R,
8 W

10 R,
5 W
(including 1 DD)
